messages.title: The damage Brexit will do to our country doesn’t bear thinking about.
messages.content: As a mother of three young children, and someone who teachers a classroom of 5-year-olds day in, day out, I can’t bear the thought of what Brexit will mean for them.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An extra £10 billion for schools, recruitment of 20,000 new teachers to relieve pressure on existing staff, and reduce class sizes and ensure education is improved for each and every child.
35 hours free childcare from nine months will help working families, many of whom struggle to afford the unbelievably high cost of childcare.

issues.brexitEurope: The damage Brexit will do to our country doesn’t bear thinking about.
issues.education: An extra £10 billion for schools will make, including the recruitment of 20,000 new teachers.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a mother of three young children, and someone who teachers a classroom of 5-year-olds day in, day out, I can’t bear the thought of what Brexit will mean for them.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Backing the Liberal Democrats to stop Brexit and improve the lives of families up and down Britain.
